text: Christophe Steiner (born 1958) is a Monegasque banker and politician. He worked for Merrill Lynch from 1991 to 2000. He served as the vice president of the National Council from 2013 to 2016, and he has served as its president from 2016 to 2018, as a member of the New Majority. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1958 births Category:Monegasque bankers Category:Presidents of the National Council (Monaco) Category:Monegasque politicians Category:Merrill (company) people Category:Knights of the Order of Saint-Charles
title: Christophe Steiner
